actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4484.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey for scrapping by the National Maritime Museum Association a vessel in the National Defense Reserve Fleet that is scheduled to be scrapped.

summary.text: Historic Fleet Restoration Act of 1992 - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey to the National Maritime Museum Association (San Francisco, California) certain National Defense Reserve Fleet vessels that are scheduled to be scrapped.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey for scrapping by the National Maritime Museum Association a vessel in the National Defense Reserve Fleet that is scheduled to be scrapped.
